page.title: 11Population of Priors Marston
page.content: {Population}on Inhabitants 517 Sept 7th 1985 Males 263 Females 254 Children under 5 21 Minors under 18 92 Adults 404 Adults over 60 100 Widows 24 Widowers 3 Married couples 109 {Nationalities }American 4 German 1 Austrian 1 Portugese 2 {Movement}since Born 3 Jan 1st 1985 Died 3 Moved into village 36 Left village 33 Families here over 5 years 120 Families here over 25 years 56 Adults born & still living here 32 Working abroad & maintaining homes 6 Returning to village for weekends 9 Adults serving in the Forces 1
